column5: A unique Masters program for graduates of liberal arts, science and business programs that is accredited by both the CPA and ACCAAccredited by CPA Ontario (Chartered Professional Accountants of Ontario) and the ACCA (Association of Chartered Certified Accountants), the Schulich Master of Accounting (MAcc) is an academically rigorous and highly intensive full-time program designed to prepare students for a career in professional accountancy.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
